name: Aatrox
skill: Aatrox strikes his target, dealing 200% / 210% / 225% of his Attack Damage, and heals himself for 25% / 30% / 40% of his maximum Health.

name: Aphelios
skill: Aphelios launches 4 / 4 / 8 attacks simultaneously, one at his target and the rest at the enemies nearest to them, dealing 175% / 200% / 300% of his Attack Damage plus 200 / 300 / 600 bonus physical damage to each.

name: Ashe
skill: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy, dealing 300 / 400 / 800 magic damage to the first enemy hit and stunning them for 1.5s / 1.5s / 2.5s. If the arrow travels at least 5 hexes, the stun duration is doubled. Enemies within 1 hex receive 50% of these effects.

name: Brand
skill: Brand launches a ball of fire at nearest non-seared enemy, searing them for 550 / 700 / 1000 magic damage over 12 seconds. Seared enemies have 40% / 50% / 60% reduced Magic Resist.

name: Darius
skill: Darius transforms into a God-Wolf, becoming unstoppable as he lunges towards a nearby enemy. 3 / 4 / 10 God-Wolves join him in his hunt, each targeting their own prey. Enemies bitten by a God-Wolf are dealt 250% / 350% / 5000% of Darius's Attack Power as physical damage and have their Armor reduced by 60% for 6 seconds. After biting his prey, Darius' next 3 / 4 / 10 attacks restore 10% of his maximum Health.

name: Diana
skill: Diana calls forth moonlight, drawing in all nearby enemies, dealing 200 / 300 / 1500 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5s / 2s / 4s.

name: Draven
skill: Draven starts spinning an axe, empowering his next attack to deal 200% / 220% / 500% of his Attack Damage plus 150 / 200 / 500 bonus physical damage. It will return to his location after striking the target and if Draven catches it, it will refresh the buff. Draven can spin up to two axes at a time.

name: Garen
skill: Garen calls down a sword that strikes a large area around his target, dealing 20% / 25% / 200% of each target's max Health in magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 60% for 6 seconds. Garen gains a shield equal to 50% of his maximum Health for seconds.

name: Gragas
skill: Gragas drinks from his cask, granting him 40% / 50% / 60% damage reduction for 4 seconds, and causing his next Basic Attack to deal 175 / 250 / 400 bonus magic damage.

name: Hecarim
skill: Hecarim creates an aura around himself for 3 seconds. Each enemy within takes 300 / 400 / 800 magic damage, and Hecarim heals himself for 450 / 600 / 1200 over the duration.

name: Heimerdinger
skill: Heimerdinger empowers his Baby Dragon, causing its next attack to be overcharged, launching three fireballs across the battlefield, dealing 250 / 400 / 7777 magic damage while burning enemies for 3% of the their maximum Health as true damage over 6 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration. If Heimerdinger does not have a turret, this spell will create one instead.

name: Ivern
skill: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him, gifting her 100% of his Ability Power. Daisy immediately casts Shockwave upon arrival. If Daisy is already summoned, Ivern increases her Ability Power by 50% / 75% / 300% and commands her to cast Shockwave again.

name: Jax
skill: Jax slams his target for 200% / 220% / 300% of his Attack Damage and gains 33% stacking Attack Speed for the remainder of combat. Jax leaps to the nearest enemy if no target is in his Attack Range.

name: Kalista
skill: Kalista hurls a spear towards the farthest enemy, dealing 200% / 225% / 250% of her Attack Damage plus 400 / 700 / 1100 bonus physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If this kills the target, the spear continues and will deal the overkill damage to the next target it hits.

name: Karma
skill: Karma fires a burst of energy towards a random enemy's location that detonates upon impact, dealing 200 / 250 / 1000 magic damage to adjacent enemies, and reducing Karma's maximum mana by 20 / 20 / 40 (down to a minimum of 10). Karma empowers every third cast, causing it to launch three bursts of energy toward different targets instead of one.

name: Katarina
skill: Katarina throws a dagger at the farthest enemy, dealing 110 / 150 / 300 magic damage. When the dagger lands near the target Katarina teleports to it and immediately launches 3 additional daggers at the nearest enemies that each deal 50 / 75 / 150 magic damage.

name: Kayle
skill: Kayle ascends every 5s / 4s / 1s, gaining additional bonuses. 1st: Attacks deal 70% / 80% / 1000% of Kayle's Attack Damage as bonus true damage. 2nd: Attacks explode around the target dealing her Attack Damage and bonus true damage to adjacent enemies. 3rd: Every 7th attack grants Kayle damage immunity for 1 second. 4th: Hits cause swords to rain down around the target, dealing 250 / 400 / 10000 magic damage.

name: Kennen
skill: Kennen engulfs himself in flame, dashing behind his target, then to the farthest enemy. Enemies he passes through are zapped dealing 150 / 200 / 400 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5s / 2s / 3s.

name: Kha'Zix
skill: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing 250 / 350 / 550 magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent allies, this damage is increased to 750 / 1050 / 1650.

name: Kindred
skill: For 2.5s / 3s / 10s Lamb creates a zone around herself that prevents allies within from falling below 300 / 500 / 1000 health. While Lamb's Respite is active, Wolf is invulnerable. Wolf's Ability: Wolf returns to Lamb, healing them both 150 / 275 / 9999 and then launches himself at the lowest health enemy, dealing 300 / 550 / 9999 magic damage.

name: Kled
skill: Kled enters combat on Skaarl, granting him a shield for 80% of his maximum health. When the shield is broken he dismounts, briefly becoming untargetable, and granting him 50 / 60 / 70% Attack Speed and causing every 4th attack to deal 200% of his Attack Damage.

name: LeBlanc
skill: LeBlanc launches ethereal chains at the two enemies nearest her, dealing 150 / 225 / 400 magic damage and, after a short delay, stunning them for 1.5s / 2s / 3s.

name: Lee Sin
skill: Lee Sin slams the ground, dealing 225 / 350 / 700 magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their attack speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

name: Leona
skill: Leona raises her shield, reducing all incoming damage by 40 / 80 / 400 for 4 seconds.

name: Lissandra
skill: Lissandra hurls a dagger toward the enemy with the highest Attack Damage, dealing 350 / 450 / 550 magic damage to the first target it hits. After hitting its initial target or at its final destination, the dagger explodes dealing 175 / 225 / 275 magic damage to nearby targets. All enemies hit by this spell have their Attack Damage reduced by 40% for 4 seconds.

name: Lulu
skill: Lulu casts an enchantment on 3 / 3 / 5 units nearest to her. If this enchants an ally, they gain 30% / 60% / 100% bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds. If this enchants an enemy, they are transformed into a docile feline, stunning them for 2s / 2.5s / 4s and causing them to take 20% increased damage.

name: Lux
skill: Lux launches her wand toward her farthest ally, which returns to her shortly after reaching them. Lux and each ally touched by the wand are shielded 150 / 225 / 400 for 3 seconds. Additionally, Lux empowers her next basic attack to deal an additional 200 / 350 / 800 magic damage.

name: Mordekaiser
skill: Mordekaiser shields himself for 50% of his maximum health for 5 seconds, empowering his mace to deal 450 / 600 / 5000 bonus magic damage and gain 1 hex of range for the same duration.Bonus Damage:450 / 600 / 5000

name: Morgana
skill: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing 200 / 300 / 550 magic damage. After 3 seconds, all chained enemies are dealt an additional 200 / 300 / 550 magic damage and stunned for 2s / 3s / 4s.

name: Nautilus
skill: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up and stunning them for 3s / 4s / 6s, and dealing 100 / 200 / 500 magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive half of this effect.

name: Nidalee
skill: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, leaping behind her target. While in cougar form, Nidalee's attack range is reduced to 1 hex, she gains 45% dodge chance, and whenever she dodges her next attack deals 150 / 250 / 450 bonus magic damage.

name: Nocturne
skill: Every third attack, Nocturne slashes all adjacent enemies for 125% of his Attack Damage, and heals himself for 70% / 80% / 90% of the damage dealt. If only one target is hit, Nocturne increases his Attack Speed by 20% / 30% / 60% for 3 seconds.

name: Nunu
skill: Willump bites his target, dealing 500 / 750 / 1500 magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage and becomes true damage.

name: Pantheon
skill: Pantheon braces his shield, reducing all incoming damage by 75% / 80% / 90% for 4 seconds, and dealing 340% / 350% / 400% of his Attack Damage in the area in front of him over the duration.

name: Poppy
skill: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing 100 / 150 / 225 magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks 200 / 300 / 450 damage.

name: Rell
skill: Rell leaps into the air, creating a tether between herself and her farthest ally. When she lands the tether is broken, granting all allies near and between them a 350 / 500 / 3000 shield for 4 seconds and stunning all enemies in the same area for 2s / 2.5s / 8s.

name: Riven
skill: Riven empowers her blade, stunning nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds while dealing 100 / 200 / 350 magic damage. For the next 8 seconds, she gains 80% / 90% / 100% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Ryze
skill: Ryze imprisons the nearest enemy, dealing 200 / 250 / 800 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5s / 2s / 4s. His next cast is then empowered to spread from his target, applying the same damage and stun to all enemies in a large area around the target.

name: Sejuani
skill: Sejuani signals Bristle to charge, dealing 300/450/750 magic damage and stunning the target for 2s / 3s / 4s. She then gains Frost Armor, granting her 60/120/300 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Sett
skill: Sett pulls back for a punch, shredding 15 / 20 / 25 armor for 10 seconds and dealing 200% / 220% / 250% of his attack damage as physical damage to all enemies in the area.

name: Soraka
skill: Soraka calms the area around the enemy with the highest current percent mana, dealing 150 / 250 / 500 magic damage to all enemies hit and increasing the cost of their next ability by 35% / 35% / 50%.

name: Syndra
skill: Syndra grabs the nearest enemy and flings them towards the farthest enemy, dealing 250 / 350 / 650 magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact and stunning the thrown target for 2s / 2.5s / 4s.

name: Taric
skill: All allies in a large area around Taric are healed for 500 / 750 / 5000 and gain 50 / 75 / 500 Armor for 5 seconds.

name: Teemo
skill: Teemo scatters 4 / 6 / 66 Infernal Souls around a random enemy. When an enemy nears an Infernal Soul (or after 3 seconds), it explodes dealing 100 / 140 / 6666 magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Attack Speed by 50%.

name: Thresh
skill: Thresh throws his scythe, chaining to the farthest enemy (2 / 3 / 5 pull), dealing 100 / 200 / 300 magic damage, and pulling them toward himself.

name: Trundle
skill: Trundle drains the strength of his current target, stealing 30% / 40% / 50% of their Health, Armor, Magic Resist, and Attack Damage for 6 seconds.

name: Udyr
skill: Udyr swaps between Turtle and Tiger stance with each cast, gaining the following benefits: Turtle: Gains a 200 / 300 / 450 shield for 4 seconds. Tiger: Strikes 3 times quickly with his next Basic Attack for 100% / 110% / 120% of his Attack Damage.

name: Varus
skill: Varus fires a hail of arrows around his target, dealing 140% / 150% / 200% of his Attack Damage as physical damage. Varus and allies within the area are blessed, causing them to deal 25 / 50 / 100 bonus magic damage with their attacks for 6 seconds.

name: Vayne
skill: Vayne's attacks apply Silver Bolts. The third stack consumes all stacks on the target to deal 85 / 110 / 160 bonus true damage.

name: Vel'Koz
skill: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy for 3 seconds toward the enemy nearest the center of the battlefield, dealing 1000/1250/4000 total magic damage over the duration. The beam widens as Vel'Koz channels, and he will pivot if there are no enemies in the area.

name: Viego
skill: Viego corrupts the soul of his target for 5 seconds, stunning them and dealing 200/300/1500 magic damage, increasing 100% each second. Viego will be interrupted if he is stunned, and Viego's allies prefer not to target his victim during soul corruption.If his victim dies, they are resurrected at full Health to fight for him, but they lose 1500%/700%/0% of their maximum Health per second. Resurrected enemies receive the Trait bonuses of Viego's team instead of their own.

name: Viktor
skill: Viktor blasts his target, dealing 300/500/750 magic damage to the nearest enemy. He also grants a 150/225/375 Health shield to the 3 allies nearest his target for 5 seconds.

name: Vladimir
skill: Vladimir deals 250/350/450 magic damage to the target and heals for 200/280/360 Health.

name: Volibear
skill: Volibear leaps toward his target, then slams the ground in a large area around him. This effect knocks up and stuns enemies for 2.50/3.00/10.00 seconds, removing any shields and dealing 150/250/2000 magic damage.

name: Warwick
skill: Warwick leaps to the enemy with the lowest percent Health, stunning them, dealing 200/300/400 magic damage, and healing himself for 80% of the damage over 2 seconds. If this Ability kills the target, Warwick will instantly cast it again.

name: Yasuo
skill: Yasuo strikes his target, dealing 300/400/600 magic damage. He then empowers his blade, gaining 30/40/60 stacking bonus true damage on-hit for the rest of combat.

name: Ziggs
skill: Ziggs throws an arcane bomb at his target, dealing 250/350/450 magic damage.

name: Zyra
skill: Zyra sends a surge of vines toward her farthest enemy, dealing 250/350/600 magic damage and stunning all enemies they hit for 2.00/2.50/3.50 seconds.
